snippet: A new web video takes a slap at Mitt Romney and his “47 percent remarks” by showing a sanitation worker whose route, it says, includes Mr. Romney’s oceanfront home in La Jolla, Calif.
abstract: A new web video takes a slap at Mitt Romney and his “47 percent remarks” by showing a sanitation worker whose route, it says, includes Mr. Romney’s oceanfront home in La Jolla, Calif.

headline.main: At a Romney Home, the View From the Curb
